long_description: HullyRollers roller saddles provide easy loading for transport of kayaks and rowing shells on your Yakima roof rack, sold separately. Pair with Mako Aero Saddles, Mako Saddles, and LandShark Saddles for the ultimate ease of loading; all sold separately. Universal joint design allows roller sets to rock and pivot, facilitating loading and self-adjusting to any hull shape. Wide wheels and generous Kraton(TM) padded rollers create ample cushioned load-bearing surface along the hull. Boat rides steady, with neither side-to-side nor back-and-forth motion. Sold as a pair with 16 ft. heavy-duty tie-down strap included; customize with another pair of HullyRollers or pair of Mako Saddles, sold separately. Comes with 1 set of bow/stern tie-downs with adjustable strap and heavy-duty hooks. Fits on Yakima round or square bars, sold separately.
short_description: HullyRollers roller saddles provide easy loading for transport of kayaks and rowing shells on your Yakima roof rack, sold separately.
